Background

I'm an entrepreneur, sports marketer and undergraduate at Drexel University seeking a degree in marketing and entrepreneurship. For my work with my start-up, 3SecondReceipts, I was named Entrepreneur Magazine's College Entrepreneur of 2009 and was ranked among the top 25 college entrepreneurs in the world. I love technology that makes life easier and on Saturday and Sunday mornings you'll find me down at the pub supporting Manchester United in between training for cycle treks and triathlons.
